content: > **please note this pattern is also > available for free on haakmaarraak nl 1 > the paid version of this pattern is > styled free of advertisements and > easily printable ** the raspberry road blanket is a great way to show off your yarns this blanket is worked in the round and this makes the gradient change even more gradual the incorporated jacob s ladders are a fun little addition to the star shape all you need is 1 skein of scheepjes whirl the blanket measures 104cm 51in in diameter the pattern is suitable for beginners as the stitches used are very basic **used stitches include us ** * chain * single_crochet * double_crochet this star blanket has only 9 points instead of the usual 12 due to the inclusion of jacob s ladders the pattern contains instructions for when you want to make more points - please note that your blanket will be a bit smaller then 1 https //haakmaarraak nl/free-crochet-pattern-raspberry-road-blanket/
